items.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
details: Developed and maintained web applications using React.js, Node.js, and Firebase, ensuring scalable and efficient performance.
Implemented REST APIs and integrated authentication systems to improve user experience and data security.
Collaborated with senior developers to design and deploy new features, reducing bug occurrences by 20%.
Worked on optimizing database queries and application performance for faster load times.
